/* EXPERIMENTAL CODE - NON COMPILEABLE VERSION OF C++ */
/*PLEASE DO NOT EDIT THIS CODE*/
/*This code was generated using the UMPLE @UMPLE_VERSION@ modeling language!*/

namespace example{
#include "Switch.h"


  //------------------------
  // MEMBER VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  //Switch State Machines
  enum Status { On, Off }
  private Status status;

  //Switch Do Activity Threads
  Thread doActivityStatusOffThread = null;
  //------------------------
  // CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------
  
 Switch::Switch()
  {
    setStatus(Status.On);
  }
  
  //------------------------
  // COPY CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------

 Switch::Switch(const Switch & switch)
  {  }
  	
  //------------------------
  // Operator =
  //------------------------

 Switch Switch::operator=(const Switch & switch)
  {  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  String Switch::getStatusFullName()
  {
    String answer = status.toString();
    return answer;
  }

  Status Switch::getStatus()
  {
    return status;
  }

  bool Switch::press()
  {
    boolean wasEventProcessed = false;

    switch (status)
    {
      case On:
        setStatus(Status.Off);
        wasEventProcessed = true;
        break;
    }

    return wasEventProcessed;
  }

  private void Switch::setStatus(Status aStatus)
  {
    status = aStatus;

    // entry actions and do activities
    switch(status)
    {
      case Off:
        doActivityStatusOffThread = new DoActivityThread(this,"doActivityStatusOff");
        break;
    }
  }

   void Switch::doActivityStatusOff()
  {
     try
     {
       keepDoing();
     }
     catch (InterruptedException e)
     {
 
     }
  }

  private static class DoActivityThread extends Thread
  {
    Switch controller;
    String doActivityMethodName;
    
    public DoActivityThread(Switch aController,String aDoActivityMethodName)
    {
      controller = aController;
      doActivityMethodName = aDoActivityMethodName;
      start();
    }
    
    public void run()
    {
      if ("doActivityStatusOff".equals(doActivityMethodName))
      {
        controller.doActivityStatusOff();
      }
    }
  }

  
  //------------------------
  // DESTRUCTOR
  //------------------------
  
Switch::~Switch()
  {}

}
